document.full_text: voters in the town of lead, south dakota, rejected a proposal on tuesday that would have allowed nude dancing at bars in its historic downtown, a move supporters had said would give an economic boost to the struggling mining town.
document.title: struggling south dakota mining town rejects nude dancing
lines_and_colors: voters in the town of lead, south dakota, rejected a proposal on tuesday that would have allowed nude dancing at bars in its historic downtown, a move supporters had said would give an economic boost to the struggling mining town.
